46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Junadah bin Abi Umayyah said:"I heard Busr bin Abi Artah say: 'I heard the Messenger of Allah say: Hand should not be cut off while traveling

chapter.eng-name: Cutting (The thief's hand off) while traveling
